problemId:
• Provides reliability to employee CVs.
• Facilitates getting the right person to the right job.
• Reduces loss of talent.
scaleId:
•Token distributors must be well trained and take the exercise seriously.
• Top-down push from management.
• HR at the forefront.
economyId: • HR Objectives tokens allow employees to measure their own success within the context of their company as a way to propel their careers forward.
governanceId: • The HR Objectives tokens are regulated and created by a committee which includes the head of HR, and the managing director of the company.
stakeholdersId:
• The HR Objectives committee regulates the circulation of tokens.
• Department heads are responsible for distribution of tokens.
• Employees receive tokens once every year.
alternativesId:
• Hiring managers ask current and past bosses for references.
• Hiring managers must take their potential employee's word.
issuanceId:
• Pools of tokens are created at the start of each year based on the previous years objectives. The better the results, the more tokens are created.
• The tokens are issued and distributed by the HR Objectives committee.
whyId:
• Prevents loss of information if managers leave the company.
• Prevents misinformation from employees to managers when applying for jobs.
• Prevents unfair hirings and spreading of lies between former bosses and hiring managers.
outsideId:
• Tokens are only valid within one same company or organizational umbrella.
• This could change in the future if some partnerships are explored.
incentivesId:
•Demonstrated track record for each employee, with no loss of information.
• Higher chances of being considered for better job offers.
• Better benefits tied to quantity and quality of tokens.
tokenId:
• The HR Objectives committee creates and distributes tokens to department heads.
• Department heads distribute tokens to their teams.
• All employees receive tokens once a year at their year-end reviews.
• Tokens do not decrease or increase value over time.
usageId: • Tokens are presented in job interviews as a portfolio of past jobs, results obtained, and overall trajectory within the company.
